result.purpose: This folder contains examples of shell scripts that utilize hcldec to read and extract values from configuration files.
result.architecture: The folder follows a simple script-based architecture where shell scripts are used to demonstrate the functionality of hcldec in processing configuration files.

cmd/hcldec/examples/sh-config-file/examp.purpose: This script reads a configuration file using hcldec and extracts values for use in the shell.
risks: Command injection if input is not properly sanitized
Potential exposure of sensitive information through environment variables
